title: Bought Infernal alistar skin half off(487rp), got the full price(975rp) deducted from my account
body: went from about 3200 rp to ~2300 rp after buying arcade riven, then i bought the infernal alistar skin and im down to 1338. Buying a half off skin at 487 shouldn't take off as much as a 975 rp skin, according to math. Any help would be greatly appreciated.

replies.body:
Hey Tarthus,

We've noticed some players have had a similar issues, but it was a visual glitch with the RP amount at the top of the client. Have you tried relogging? If that doesn't resolve the issue, and you were charged the improper amount, please [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can make the appropriate adjustment.
